rafting.title: Rafting
rafting.description: Feel the thrill of white-water rafting on the Bhotekoshi River. Suitable for beginners and experienced adventurers alike, this activity promises adrenaline-pumping excitement with stunning river views.

hiking.title: Hiking
hiking.description: Explore scenic trails surrounded by lush forests and majestic mountains. Perfect for nature lovers, hiking provides fresh air, beautiful viewpoints, and a chance to reconnect with the outdoors.

swimming.title: Swimming
swimming.description: Relax and unwind in our crystal-clear swimming pool surrounded by lush greenery. Suitable for all ages, enjoy a refreshing swim, lounge by the poolside, or have fun with family and friends.
